item.title: E2ENet: Dynamic Sparse Feature Fusion for Accurate and Efficient 3D Medical Image Segmentation
item.description: E2ENet: A novel 3D medical image segmentation model boasts high accuracy and efficiency by dynamically fusing multi-scale features and using restricted depth-shift 3D convolutions, significantly outp…
